title: Modern Artistic Duplex with Elevator and Private Parking in Old Town Krosno
description: Step into luxury with this immaculate duplex in Krosno's Old Town, offering 3 spacious bedrooms and 3 contemporary bathrooms within 158 sqm of light-filled living space. The open floor plan seamlessly connects the living, dining, and kitchen areas, perfect for entertaining or relaxing in modern comfort. With a modern facade design, elevator access directly to your floor, reception desk service, and motion-sensor exterior lights, every detail speaks to upscale urban living. Your private parking space adds convenience just outside your door.
neighborhood_description: Located in the heart of Old Town Krosno, this property is surrounded by a dynamic artistic community and flourishing local life. The area boasts vibrant cafes, galleries, and events enriched by green surroundings—a rare calm amid the creative buzz. As a growing neighborhood, Old Town merges historic charm with modern energy, making it an ideal choice for lifestyle-driven professionals.
lifestyle_benefits: Upscale living surrounded by an artistic locale
Effortless access with private elevator from parking
Easy commute with nearby highway connection
Peaceful, green surroundings amidst cultural hotspots
target_buyer: Ideal for young professionals or entrepreneurs seeking a lavish, low-maintenance home that lets them immerse in local culture while enjoying modern conveniences and privacy.
market_positioning: This property stands out as a premium duplex option in Krosno's Old Town, offering a fusion of modern amenities and cultural charm—a rare blend in an area renowned for its artistic community and natural setting. Perfect for luxury-minded buyers wanting refinement and creative vibes outside city intensity.
